Class UserService

java.lang.Object
service.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
Service class responsible for handling user-related operations such as authentication, password management, and retrieving user details based on different criteria.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserService(List<User> users)
    Constructor that initializes the service with a list of pre-loaded users.

  • Method Details

    • findUserByNric

      public Optional<User> findUserByNric(String nric)
      Finds a user by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user to search for.
      Returns:
      Optional An Optional containing the user if found, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • findUserByUsername

      public Optional<User> findUserByUsername(String username)
      Finds a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to search for.
      Returns:
      Optional An Optional containing the user if found, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • findApplicantByNric

      Finds an applicant by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant to search for.
      Returns:
      Optional An Optional containing the applicant if found, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • authenticate

      public Optional<User> authenticate(String nric, String password)
      Authenticates a user by their NRIC and password.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user to authenticate.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      Optional An Optional containing the user if authentication is successful, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • updatePasswordWithValidation

      public boolean updatePasswordWithValidation(String nric, String currentPass, String newPass)
      Validates and updates a user's password.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user whose password is being updated.
      currentPass - The current password of the user.
      newPass - The new password to set.
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if the password is updated successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the NRIC is invalid or passwords are empty or match.

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword(String nric, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Updates a user's password.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user whose password is being updated.
      oldPassword - The user's current password.
      newPassword - The new password to set.
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if the password is updated successfully, false if the current password is incorrect.

    • getOfficersForManager

      public List<HDBOfficer> getOfficersForManager(HDBManager manager)
      Retrieves a list of all officers assigned to a specific manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager whose officers are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      List A list of HDB officers assigned to the manager's projects.
